LANGUAGE.LABEL: Team Branding
Custom Team Header

Click the "Upload Header" button below to upload a custom header for your team. Your custom header must be a .png, .gif or .jpg file with a width of 600 pixels and a height of approximately 100 pixels. You can right click the header image above to save it as a sample header file.
Custom Mobile Header

Click the "Upload Mobile Header" button below to upload a custom moble header for your team's mobile application. Your custom header must be a .png, .gif or .jpg file with a width of 300 pixels and a height of approximately 70 pixels.
Custom Team Logo
Click the "Upload Logo" button below to upload a custom logo for your team. Your custom logo must be a .png, .gif or .jpg file.
